name: Queen's Cup
description: Queen's Cup is a social card game inspired by the popular game King's Cup. Queen's Cup can be played with any number of players aged 21+. Please drink responsibly! Queen's Cup was developed by Christopher Ravosa, Marinel Tinnirello, Dillon Lane, Melissa Chodziutko, and Bailey Villipart for the 2021 Marist College Game Jam.
